name: seal-case
effect: Contains Seals used for decorating Pokéballs.
short_effect: Stores Seals that can be applied to Poké Ball capsules.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the exteriors of Poké Balls.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the exteriors of Poké Balls.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the exteriors of Poké Balls.
